field.name: partner
field.domain: self.isContact = false AND self.isSupplier = true AND (:company member of self.companySet)

field.name: invoiceLine
field.domain: self.invoice.company = :company AND self.invoice.partner = :partner AND (self.invoice.operationTypeSelect = 1 OR self.invoice.operationTypeSelect = 2)

button.name: computeDepreciationBtn

button.name: updateDepreciationSettingsBtn
button.title: Update depreciation settings
button.showIf: statusSelect == 2 && fixedAssetLineList && fixedAssetLineList.length > 0 && !$canUpdateDepreciation && accountingValue != null && accountingValue != 0 && !isEqualToFiscalDepreciation && !$readonly()
